Package MultiGame.Game

Class GameStateMulti

java.lang.Object
MultiGame.Game.GameStateMulti
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameStateMulti
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class holds the state of game and all of its elements. This class also handles user inputs, which affect the game state.
Author:
Seyed Mohammad Ghaffarian
See Also:
